meanings.definition: A type of Indian curry dish typically made with lentils and meat.
meanings.sent1: I tried a delicious dansak at the Indian restaurant last night.
meanings.sent2: My mom makes the best dansak with lentils and chicken.
meanings.sent3: The dansak was so flavorful, it made my taste buds dance!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the dansak filled the room, tempting everyone to try a bite.
meanings.sent5: The colorful dansak looked like a work of art on the plate.

meanings.definition: To dance in a lively and spirited manner.
meanings.sent1: At the party, we all dansaked to the upbeat music.
meanings.sent2: The children dansaked around the garden, full of joy.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to dansak around the room, chasing its tail.
meanings.sent4: Her heart dansaked with happiness as she received the good news.
meanings.sent5: The leaves dansaked in the wind, creating a beautiful dance in the air.
